topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: CGI Tools/Libraries

name: libcgic - yet another C CGI framework
short_description: Yet another C CGI framework. Includes CGI library, template parser library and helper libraries (mysql helper, hash support). Works with FastCGI (must be compiled with libfcgi). Documentation available at http://www.pavluk.org/projects/libcgic/libcgic/.
